author: Principal Correspondent
text:
A consultative meeting on setting up a District Level Vigilance Committee on captive elephants was held here on Monday.

The committee is to be set up as per directions of the Madras High Court in response to a writ petition filed by one Radha Rajan.

The committee is to be set up as per the Rule 15 of the Tamil Nadu Captive Elephants(Management and Maintenance) Rules, 2011.

District Collector A.Gnanasekaran presided over the meeting. Discussions revolved around the maintenance of temple elephants of Tiruvannamalai Sri Arunachaleswarar Temple and Padavedu Sri Renugambal Temple. A number of government officials participated in the meeting.

The committee is to be set up as per directions of the Madras High Court
title: Panel on captive elephants soon
